Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 92nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1973...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Penn on 2/12/1978 (Going to PEN: RF R. Gonsalves, C C. Miller, SS C. Primeaux. Going to PIT: LF R. Doan)...
Had first career hit on 7/15/1978, off Michael Patnaude (GHG)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/18/1978, off Jaime Lucky (LP)...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against West Texas on 7/15/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/2/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $1,888,888 per year...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1985...
